title: Listen Back To A 1990 Interview With Actor Christopher Lee
teaser: Christopher Lee died Sunday in London at the age of 93. He had more than 250 TV and film appearances, and was best known for his roles in Dracula and Star Wars. In 1990 he was working on Gremlins 2.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
